attributes.action: Bestow a knighthood on Robert Hardy (actor/historian) Full name Timothy Sydney Robert Hardy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Robert Hardy has been, to quote, 'an enduringly successful '
and beloved actor, due to his versatililty and depth, over a
career which has spanned more than 50 years and continues to
this day. He has also become a renowned and respected historian
who gives of much of his time to historically linked movements
such as, most noteably, the Mary Rose Trust (for whom he is a
trustee) and The Battlefields Trust. He also gives, generously,
of his time to many other worthwhile causes around the country.

Further, Mr Hardy is always the consumate gentleman and is a
wonderful role model and inspiration to many through his
hard-work, demeanour,commitment and kindnesses. Certainly, he is
doing much to bring attention to areas of our past which are
too often ignored.

We, the undersigned, feel that a knighthood is long-overdue and
thoroughly deserved.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
